gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 131, Jazz 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Jazz, 131-102. Terance Mann led Los Angeles with 19 points as Norman Powell added 18 points. James Harden totaled the third triple-double of his season (77th of career) with 13 points, 10 rebounds, and 15 assists while Ivica Zubac had his fourth consecutive double-double with 12 points and 10 rebounds. Talen Horton-Tucker led Utah with 17 points.
